dashboard.title: Welcome to Dashboard
dashboard.description: This is your dashboard content area. You can add your widgets, charts, and other components here.

enable.title: Enable collaboration
enable.description: Are you sure you want to enable collaboration for property "{{name}}"?

disable.title: Disable collaboration
disable.description: Are you sure you want to disable collaboration for property "{{name}}"?

confirmArchive.title: Archive Properties
confirmArchive.description: Are you sure you want to archive {count} propert{plural}?

confirmUnarchive.title: Unarchive Properties
confirmUnarchive.description: Are you sure you want to unarchive {count} propert{plural}?

confirmDelete.title: Delete Property
confirmDelete.description: Are you sure you want to delete {name}? This action cannot be undone.

detail.title: Property Details
detail.iCalDescription: Use this iCal link to synchronize with external services such as Airbnb and Google Calendar.

public.title: Property
public.notPubliclyShared: This property is not publicly shared. Please contact the property owner for more information.
public.failedToLoad: Failed to load property details. Please try again later.

list.noPropertiesFound: No properties found for this building

edit.attachPropertiesDescription: Attach properties that don't have a building assigned to this building

edit.basicInformationDescription: Enter the basic details of the bank account

edit.addDescription: Create a new key by filling in the information below
edit.basicInformationDescription: Enter the basic details of the key
edit.name: Name
edit.descriptionSectionDescription: Enter a detailed description for this key (optional)
edit.propertySectionDescription: Select the property this key belongs to

list.title: Property Requests
list.deleteMessage: Are you sure you want to delete the request for {{name}}? This action cannot be undone.

enable.title: Enable collaboration
enable.description: Are you sure you want to enable collaboration for request "{{name}}"?

disable.title: Disable collaboration
disable.description: Are you sure you want to disable collaboration for request "{{name}}"?

edit.title: Edit Request
edit.addDescription: Create a new request by filling in the information below

edit.title: Edit Lease
edit.editDescription: Update the lease information below. Property and tenant cannot be changed.
edit.addDescription: Create a new lease by filling in the information below
edit.propertyTenantEditDescription: Property and tenant information (cannot be changed)
edit.propertyTenantAddDescription: Select the property and tenant for this lease

edit.title: Edit Reservation
edit.editDescription: Update the reservation information below. Property and contact cannot be changed.
edit.addDescription: Create a new reservation by filling in the information below

revenue.title: Add Revenue
revenue.description: Create a new revenue transaction by filling in the information below
revenue.generalInfoDescription: Enter the transaction type and date

expense.title: Add Expense
expense.description: Create a new expense transaction by filling in the information below
expense.allocationDescription: Select the property and optionally the lease for this transaction

deleteConfirmation.title: Delete Task
deleteConfirmation.description: Are you sure you want to delete "{{taskTitle}}"? This action cannot be undone.

list.title: Documents
list.getStarted: Get started by creating a new document.
list.templatesWillAppear: Templates will appear here once created.

edit.startTypingToGeneratePreview: Start typing in the editor to generate preview
edit.startTypingPlaceholder: Start typing your document content here...

navigation.accountDescription: Manage your public profile and private information
navigation.securityDescription: Manage your password and 2-step verification preferences
navigation.teamDescription: Manage your existing team and change roles/permissions
navigation.applicationDescription: Configure default settings for your application

companyInformation.title: Company Information
companyInformation.description: Company details are managed by administrators and cannot be modified here

changePassword.title: Change your password
changePassword.description: You can only change your password twice within 24 hours!
changePassword.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 8 characters long

team.title: Team
team.manageTeamMembers: Manage your team members and their permissions

inviteTeamMember.title: Invite Team Member
inviteTeamMember.description: Invite a new member to join your team (Max 3 invitations)
inviteTeamMember.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address
inviteTeamMember.userAlreadyExists: A user with this email already exists
inviteTeamMember.maxTeamMembersReached: You can only invite up to 2 additional team members (maximum 3 total users including admin)

team.deleteTeamMemberConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete {name}? This action cannot be undone.
team.cannotDeleteOwnAccount: You cannot delete your own account

layoutSettings.title: Layout Settings
layoutSettings.chooseColorTheme: Choose a color theme for your dashboard

defaultCity.title: Default City
defaultCity.description: Set the default city for new properties
defaultCity.label: Default City

defaultCategories.title: Default Categories
defaultCategories.description: Manage default categories with their key and reference

collaboration.title: Collaboration
collaboration.description: Manage properties you share with other companies for collaboration. You can unshare one or multiple properties at any time.

description.one: Are you sure you want to unshare this property? Other companies will no longer be able to see it.
description.many: Are you sure you want to unshare these {{count}} properties? Other companies will no longer be able to see them.

unshareAllDialog.title: Unshare All Properties
unshareAllDialog.description: Are you sure you want to unshare all {count} properties? Other companies will no longer be able to see them.

collaborationRequests.title: Property Requests
collaborationRequests.description: Manage property requests you share with other companies for collaboration. You can unshare one or multiple requests at any time.
collaborationRequests.empty: No property request has been shared.

description.one: Are you sure you want to unshare this property request? Other companies will no longer be able to see it.
description.many: Are you sure you want to unshare these {{count}} property requests? Other companies will no longer be able to see them.

unshareAllDialog.title: Unshare All Property Requests
unshareAllDialog.description: Are you sure you want to unshare all {count} property requests? Other companies will no longer be able to see them.

signature.title: Signature
signature.description: Upload and manage your company signature image
signature.deleteSignatureConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete the signature?
signature.instructions: Upload a signature image for your company

errors.imageSizeTooLarge: Image size must be less than 5MB
errors.onlyPngJpgAllowed: Only PNG and JPG image formats are allowed for signature

maintenance.title: Maintenance
maintenance.description: Manage your maintenance requests. View all tasks in the list or organize them using the Kanban board.

fileManager.title: File Manager
fileManager.temporaryFolderDescription: This is a temporary folder. Upload files to save it permanently.
fileManager.uploadFilesOrCreateFolder: Upload files or create a new folder to get started

login.enterCredentials: Enter your credentials to access your account
login.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address

logoutConfirm.title: Log out
logoutConfirm.description: Are you sure you want to log out?

forgotPassword.title: Forgot Password
forgotPassword.description: Enter your email address and we'll send you a link to reset your password
forgotPassword.emailSent: We've sent a password reset link to
forgotPassword.checkInbox: Please check your inbox and click the link to reset your password.

resetPassword.title: Reset Password
resetPassword.successDescription: Your password has been successfully reset. You can now sign in with your new password.
resetPassword.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 5 characters
resetPassword.invalidToken: Invalid reset token. Please request a new password reset.
resetPassword.invalidOrExpiredToken: Invalid or expired reset token. Please request a new password reset.
resetPassword.resetFailed: Failed to reset password. Please try again.

acceptInvitation.title: Join the Team
acceptInvitation.description: Create your account to accept the invitation
acceptInvitation.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 8 characters
acceptInvitation.invalidLink: Invalid invitation link. Please check your email.
acceptInvitation.failed: Failed to accept invitation. Please try again.

locked.title: Access Restricted
locked.description: Your access has been restricted. Please contact support.

alert.title: AI Results Disclaimer
alert.description: AI responses may contain errors. Verify important information independently.

placeholder.conversationComplete: This conversation is complete. Start a new chat to ask another question.

dailyLimit.title: Daily Limit Reached
dailyLimit.description: You've reached your daily limit of {count} questions. Please try again tomorrow.

error.generic: Sorry, an error occurred. Please try again later.

emptyState.description: Ask me anything and I'll help you out.

error.noContacts: Please add at least one contact
error.numbersWithoutWhatsApp: The following numbers do not have WhatsApp: {numbers}
error.numberWithoutWhatsApp: This number does not have WhatsApp

connected.title: WhatsApp is connected
connected.description: Your WhatsApp account has been successfully connected

qr.title: Scan QR Code to Connect WhatsApp
qr.description: Open WhatsApp on your phone and scan this QR code to connect your account
qr.instructions: Make sure your phone is connected to the internet and WhatsApp is open

disconnect.error: Failed to disconnect WhatsApp. Please try again.

check.title: WhatsApp Check
check.notExists: Phone number {number} does not have WhatsApp
check.error: Failed to check WhatsApp. Please try again.
